name: Electro Battle Tank But Ony One Fuse
name_original: Electro Battle Tank But Ony One Fuse
description:
EBT BOOF Player One Controlls

WASD movement controlls, R to Change modes, F to Fire ( hold and release)

Player Two Controlls

ArrowKeys movement controlls, Shift to change modes, Enter to fire

If you change modes while moving you can coast along for a short distance, Bullets will bounce for a short while.

Three systems to manage
  • E is your Engine which powers all of the tanks movements
  • T is your Turret which controlls aiming and shooting
  • A is your ammo which will allow your gun to shoot

Only one system can be Charged  at a time as you only have one fuse
